recipesJson.name: Watermelon Dreams
recipesJson.author: MarkSr
recipesJson.description:
Super simple SNV for a hot summer day.. The mix is very refreshing and not overly sweet.. The GL Shisha Strawberry can be changed out with the Inw Shisha Strawberry at the same percentage..

**Check out what DIY Downunder has to offer:**
https://www.facebook.com/groups/diydownunder/
https://discord.gg/kH4Fqbc
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTCwb7ULyfJALQlehomZZQA
https://www.diydownunder.com/
http://www.casaa.org/
**Have you tried this recipe?!**
**Please rate this recipe and comment below! I would LOVE to hear your experience.**

reviews.text: Used INW shisha strawberry. Great shake n vape. Wanted something with watermelon and this hits the spot. Thanks!
Subbed the CAP Double Watermelon with FA Watermelon, and used INW Sisha Strawberry and this juice is fantastic! Will definitely be one of my ADV! Thank you very much!
